title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

If the wrong selection is made, the explanation is ignored.
descriptions: The response does not accurately
The response accurately

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

If the wrong selection is made, the justification is ignored.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include the following criteria.
The response accurately includes the following criteria.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include any of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes one of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes two of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes all of the following criteria.
